page.title: 08RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES
page.content:
There are a large number of organizations in the village which cater for the recreational needs of the residents, both children and adults. There are...
{2 BROWNIE GROUPS { 1 SCOUT GROUP (cubscouts and { scouts) } {1 SURF LIFESAVING CLUB { 2 SOCIAL CLUBS { 1 OUTDOOR SWIMMING POOL { 2 PLAYING FIELDS (with swings { etc.) { 1 SENIOR CITIZEN GROUP { 3 PUBLIC HOUSES On top of this are the organizations which are linked with the various Religious Bodies in the village. There is a bi-annual carnival which takes place at the end of July. This brings the community together.
